text: Rachell Hofstetter (born January 8, 1992), better known by her online alias Valkyrae, is an American video-game streamer. She currently streams and posts videos on YouTube, mostly of her playing a variety of different games and genres. == Biography == Hofstetter was born in Washington. While attending community college, she worked at GameStop. She began a gaming channel on Instagram, and soon transitioned to Twitch. After gathering a following, she began posting gaming videos on YouTube. She is the first female gamer and content creator for 100Thieves, a competitive American esports team. Hofstetter is an advocate for women in online gaming, sometimes playing games on all-female teams. On January 13, 2020, Valkyrae left Twitch for an exclusive contract on YouTube. Valkyrae has been noted as 'The Fastest Growing Live Streamer In The World' & 'The Biggest Female Gaming Streamer In The World' according to YouTube Gaming's - Ryan Wyatt. == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
